Welcome To Shakti Daimond Tools Complete polishing and grinding solutions against multiple industries and various materials

Shakti Diamond Tools

Shakti Diamond Tools founded by Mr. D.S Patange in 2001, plot no. A712118 MIDC industry area chikalthana Aurangabad. We have more than 20 years’ manufacturing experience and the strict production control and management system.  We are engaged in quality control and outstanding service. We produced resin bond diamond and CBN grinding wheels in standard and customized shapes, including cups, bowls, dish and more. Shakti Diamond Tools manufacturing all types of diamond classify Tools ,metal bond Products, resin bond Products,   electroplating wheel these products are mainly used in auto composted manufacturing Auto Gauges Industry, Bearing manufacturing company, railway, and defense all major Industries in all over India.

Know More

Our Product
manufacturing all types of diamond classify Tools , Metal bond, Resin bond diamond Wheels & electroplating wheels

blade type diamond dresser

diamond mounted point electroplated

multi point diamond dresser
